PERSONA.NAME: Ferdinand, King of Navarre
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He tries to turn his court into a pastoral-monastic academy.

PERSONA.NAME: Berowne
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the King, falls in love with Rosaline.

PERSONA.NAME: Longaville
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the King

PERSONA.NAME: Dumaine
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the King

PERSONA.NAME: Boyet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the Princess of France

PERSONA.NAME: Marcade
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the Princess of France and messenger

PERSONA.NAME: Don Adriano de Armado
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A fantastical Spaniard and braggart, falls in love with Jacquenetta.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Nathaniel
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A curate

PERSONA.NAME: Holofernes
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A schoolmaster

PERSONA.NAME: Dull
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A simple constable

PERSONA.NAME: Costard
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A clown, tries to court Jacquenetta.

PERSONA.NAME: Moth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A clever page to Armado

PERSONA.NAME: Forester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A hunting attendant of the Princess.

PERSONA.NAME: The Princess of France
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful diplomat from France who devises a practical joke for the King.

PERSONA.NAME: Rosaline
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lady attending on the Princess of France

PERSONA.NAME: Maria
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lady attending on the Princess of France, falls in love with Longaville.

PERSONA.NAME: Katherine
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lady attending on the Princess of France, falls in love with Dumaine.

PERSONA.NAME: Jaquenetta
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A country wench, wooed by Armado.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A lord.

PERSONA.NAME: Attendants
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various attendants.
